attributes.additional_details:
We are a group of students studying at an Independent School in Eltham, South East London.

As part of our Citizenship GCSE we need to create and run a campaign relating to a subject that we care about and have an interest in.

We have selected Child Soldiers as our topic, it is an everyday issue and children our age and younger all over the world are being forced to fight in their countries wars, instead of going to school to get an education.

It is a terrible situation to be in for anyone, let alone a child.

This is something we have to put an end to.
